ItemTooltips.bottle: Bottle is great if you intend to roam as Disruptor and take advantage of the runes!
ItemTooltips.ward_observer: Be sure to purchase courier or wards as a support hero.
ItemTooltips.courier: Be sure to purchase courier or wards as a support hero.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Get Mekansm if no one else is going to get it.
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: Survivability. Period. Urn is a situational item because you don't want to delay other items that you'll need in the extention, but you also made need something to ferry through the mid to late-game.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Eul's Scepter gives you the desperate movement speed that you need and let's you easily set up your Kinetic Field!
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Disruptor is about positioning and staying away from being in the center of fights. Force Staff let's you initiate and escape with ease and comfortability.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Aghanim's on Disruptor sounds good, but so late in the game with so many other items needed; may mean that you might have to skip this for more reliable disables and situational items.
ItemTooltips.rod_of_atos: Slow enemies hard enough to get trapped in your Kinetic Field. Given its range, this gives Disruptor a ton of time to catch up or let allies chase after the slowed target.

AbilityTooltips.disruptor_thunder_strike: Although the damage is amazing, Kinetic Field and Glimpse are much more versatile in their uses and early ganks. Be sure to count the number of strikes occur on a hero. The third one means Glimpse would return him to where you last casted Thunder Strike.
AbilityTooltips.disruptor_glimpse: Maxing Glimpse first means an incredible range from heroes who are trying to flee. Be sure to use Glimpse on heroes that are also teleporting to a tower, it'll force them back to the fountain!
AbilityTooltips.disruptor_kinetic_field: If your opponent gets out of the Kinetic Field before it is done, try and Glimpse them back. Be sure to follow-up your ultimate inside the Kinetic Field.
AbilityTooltips.disruptor_static_storm: Static Storm is an AOE Silence that deals decent damage. Use it in combination with Kinetic Field. Try avoid using it on heroes that are fleeing.
